website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a classic sun hat style will find their match with this decorated model.
pros: Hat is adjustable for different head sizes
Chin strap fastens for easy wear
cons: Not a great fit for older children
Cap tends to be a little shallow

customer_reviews.title: ... day at Disney and protected my fair little ones like nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Wore all day at Disney and protected my fair little ones like nothing else! Love the full protection all around the face and neck. Also love the strap. Thought it would be bothersome, but perfect for staying on during the rides and on a boat or windy day at the beach. Also will last a while. Fit my four year old, seven year old and nine year old all perfectly due to adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our beach vacation in September for my little boys who were ages 3 and 4 (almost 5). I was a bit worried that they would be too tight as my kids have big heads. The fit was perfect! Both hats fit snugly on my boys' heads and we didn't even have to adjust the draw string in the back. The chin strap worked well, and even though the beach was very windy, they never lost their hats. The hats were comfortable and my boys enjoyed wearing them. I included some pics that I hope will be helpful with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Lhasty

customer_reviews.title: Great hats for my 3 and 5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these hats individually at Costco for about $8 each, then found a 2-pack on Amazon for less than $10! So I bought them to have extras to keep in the car for those impromptu this-traffic-is-awful stops at the playground on the way home. My kids are 3 and 5 and you can adjust the brim to fit their heads just fine. The chin straps are pretty useless though - they're too long and aren't adjustable. But these hats provide a good amount of coverage from the sun and are lightweight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun for my son
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hats for my two year old son and, surprisingly, he puts up with wearing it much better than his baseball cap. The top of the hat is adjusted via a bungee cord to ensure a snug fit that won't fall off. He wore his in the pool today and it stayed on the whole time! Plus, you get two hats, so you can keep one in the car/backpack and one at home. The only downfall is that I washed this with a white polo shirt and the color seemed to bleed over from the hat to the shirt. Other than that, I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hats!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hats!! Great price!! Adjustable brim fits my kids 1.5 years to 7 and my husband too! (who has a small adult head!)
customer_reviews.author: melissa kindred

customer_reviews.title: We are able to use one for our 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: We are able to use one for our 8 year old and one for our 3 year old. The hats are adjustable and work will. The kids don't mind them at all.
customer_reviews.author: A M DP

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT hat for kids. Love the adjustable BUNGEE design!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats!! We used this hat on a 12-day backpacking trip for my then-18-month old. Since then, we've bought 2 more to have as extras around the house because they're so great. They fit everyone from my 6 month old all the way up to my nearly-5 year old. The bungee strap helps adjust the hat and the brim is perfect to keep the sun off their whole face.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great hats, great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a sunny vacation and they are just awesome. The brims are wide for sun protection, and they keep their shape even after being drenched in the pool. My son's head sweats a lot, but these kept his head cool and comfortable. I love the two pack because we can leave one at school and keep the other at home.
customer_reviews.author: a.a.

customer_reviews.title: perfect 2 pack of sun protection hats
customer_reviews.text: Great 2 pack of sun protection hats. Come with strap for under chin and pull string strap around hat to hold snuggly into place. Light weight fabric does not leave the childs head all sweaty and hot. Cute bright blue design with subtle sharks. Love that it came as a two pack. One for our diaper bag and one for the beach bag eliminates searching for the hat when it times to pack up
customer_reviews.author: WWeber

customer_reviews.title: Good for ages under 6
customer_reviews.text: The pattern and fabric are great and as described. I bought this for a 6 year old's birthday and it fit him perfectly. However, I tried in on my 5 year old son and it was too small. The circumference was snug but mostly it was not deep enough. I guess he must have a big head - but certainly this would never fit a 10 year old unless they are way undersized. So this is great for ages 5/6 and under but don't hold your breath for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Azmtnmama

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection for my littles
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping the kids faces and necks covered when out on sunny days! Used for all kinds of outdoor activity (playground, hiking, hanging out outside). I wanted a good wide-brim for being out longer or on especially sunny days instead of their usual baseball caps. These have been great. The only complaint I have is that for my 4-y/o it is a little small height-wise and snug around. He has a big head so it may just be him. They fit our 2-y/o well.
customer_reviews.author: swifty

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe you get two hats for this price! The hats are very lightweight and seem like they'll breathe well. The sharks on the rim are a great feature- useful and fun. The brim is wide and will cover the back of the beck as well as face which was a pleasant surprise. This was a bit big on my 2.5 year old but is adjustable and works perfectly once tightened. Also love that it has a chin strap as we will be using it at the beach where wind kicks up. Totally pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats. Great fit. Has adjustable strap in back to tighten to child's head if need. Breathable air pockets so there little heads dont get too hot. Love that the sharks get brighter when their heads are getting too hot. Just wish chin strap was adjustable. It just has a small velcro patch. Basically it's just there so if the wind catches it, it wont fly off their head. My son is able to pull his hat off but it's no big deal because when he is outside the hat is the last thing on his mind.
customer_reviews.author: c96cmr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat!
customer_reviews.text: So hard to find a hat for my four year old daughter that will stay on her head. For some reason they don't make as many hats with the chin strap. Always for babies but toddlers and young children need them as well. She can play for hours and doesn't think about the hat on her head that doesn't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable hat.
customer_reviews.text: These hats are really durable my son uses his at the water park, in the pool, and just outside. They’re lightweight and easy to wash. He is 9 and it still fits. We lost our original ones after 3 years of use and so I had to buy more. So worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kids sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Works for many ages and sizes of head, protects face and neck well, stays on head (doesn't come off easily with a little wind), washable. We bought these a couple of years ago at Costco and lost one so ended up buying a couple of new ones on Amazon (don't think Costco do them anymore). Best sun hat we have had.
customer_reviews.author: T Kehl

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little hats! Our son is a lot larger than most kids his age (15 months wearing 2T) so it was becoming nearly impossible to find a hat that would fit his head appropriately and not be disproportionate in other ways. This hat stayed on his head all day and he didn't try to take it off the way he tried to remove all the other hats!
customer_reviews.author: FeldK

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Nice hats, protection from sun is great. Drawstring is sufficient to hold hat in place in wind, but has enough give to release if caught on something, so no concern for safety. Only one tiny thing kept me from giving 5-stars: If the hat gets wet, the brim can become even floppier and hard to keep out of face. Otherwise, these are great! Best yet, my 6yo loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Tyger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sun Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these come in a 2-pack: one for keeping in the car, and one for the house. They're comfortable enough that my hat-hating kiddo doesn't mind them, and the little velcro strap plus the adjustable slide in the headband mean they fit a wide range of kid sizes. They're light, but really do a good job protecting the face, ears and neck from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcwalters

customer_reviews.title: My son has albinism and this is a PERFECT hat for him
customer_reviews.text: My son has albinism and this is a PERFECT hat for him. He loves it and so do I! The quality is great and the fact that it has UPF 50+ was obviously why I bought it. I will be buying another 2pk since I am leaving one everywhere I go (school, grandma's house, mom's card, dad's car) so we have one everywhere. I just wish this brand had other colors besides blue and pink.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyne Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice material but chin straps are way too short
customer_reviews.text: The hats were cute happy material so they see my good quality but they may have been hot to wear? We won't know as the chin straps were far too short for my boys to even Buckle under their chins I wasn't able to process the return electronically I had to contact customer service to get it done. I think with longer straps they may have been okay but they didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Too Shallow
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a higher rating because these hats are great. They are affordable, practical and fit the circumference of my child's head. Unfortunately, however, the cap part is way to shallow for my kiddo who is only 2 1/2. Although he does have a larger head, we were either pulling it down or pushing it back. Even when sinched tight, the hat just doesn't stay on. If there was more material so the cap was taller, the hat would have been a win. I also wish the chin strap was adjustable, but if the hat would stay on that that part probably wouldnt be a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these hats for my 2 year old and love that they will fit for a few years. Love the UV protection! They dry quickly and are breathable so they do not cause sweaty head. The adjustable cord in the back allows it to be tightened enough that the wind does not blow it off. I have recommended these hats to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as spares for my 6- and 7-year-olds. The hats fit well, seem comfy, and my kids like the subtle shark pattern. They are polyester, so may not be breathable enough on hot days, but we'll see...The velcro safety strap under the chin makes them seem a bit baby-ish, but for the price, that's trivial. I do like that these would have fit them since a much earlier age, with room to grow; I'm not sure how many years we'll get from them now, but if they last the rest of this summer, and into next, I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats! I got two of these hats for a great price and they're so well made. They fit both my 2 year old and my 5 year old and both have room to grow. The color is a very nice blue and even though it has sharks on it, it's very gender neutral (girls like sharks too!). These will be used for several summers!
customer_reviews.author: AEW

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my toddler! And you can't beat the price! The brim is wide enough to give decent shade to his face and ahoulders.. It has the Velcro strap for under his chin. It fits him well (21 months and "average" size head). The sharks are cute but subtle. My son always asks for his hat now when we go outside and it's bright.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and holds up!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great hat and I love that it’s a two pack! We bought another set so we can keep 1 at daycare, one in the car and then we have 2 in the house. Our son is 2 and loves the hat and I love that it’s adjustable so it fits him snugly and we don’t have to worry about it flying off. Also the design is pretty subtle which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Slinky Girl

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack!! Stop looking!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3 year old son perfectly and he has a big head! We haven't had a chance to use it at the pool yet to test out the UV but I don't have any doubt it will keep his ears and neck sun burn free. The price was definitely right compared to all the others I found.
customer_reviews.author: SheShe19

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler hat ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these hats. I purchased blue and pink and the price for both was cheaper than one at Target, plus now I have extras. They wash, the can get wet. They have amazing sun coverage. I can not have about these hats enough. My kids love them I love them and they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I love this hat
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these hats three yrs ago for my oldest son who is three and love how I can adjust to his head and it's a hat that he keeps on.. now having another boy I needed another one, came across this on Amazon was so excited because it's the same hat for my oldest. When I ordered it didn't realize two came in the pack,so now I have extra one!! Which is great. Price can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: amanda Honest Mama Review

customer_reviews.title: Good sun coverage, bad chin strap.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Provides decent sun coverage, and that's what this is all about so that's a pretty good pro. Cons: the chin strap is not adjustable at all. Just a single piece of Velcro on the tips. Because of this the chin strap can only be very loosely attached under the chin. Mostly just annoys my 3 year old and does little to protect the hat being blown off in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Love_Learning

customer_reviews.title: Big but works.
customer_reviews.text: These run big. My son even has a big head for his age and I had to fully tighten these. The strings also don’t secure under his chin. Other than that it is a super cute hat and the wide brim is great for keeping the sun out of his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: I origionally bought one of these hats from Costco last summer. We loved it so much and we're sad when it blew out of the boat to a watery grave. What a pleasant surprise to be able to replace it with a 2 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 3

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I added velcro on the strap for my 1 year old... size large. (He has very large head.) The head width can be adjusted with the elastic in the back of that too.
customer_reviews.author: CWK

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats! They don't cover my son's face like a lot of other umbrella sun hats. There is enough coverage without restricting vision. I like that there is a drawstring to keep the hat a bit tighter around the back of the head, so that it doesn't fall off OR fall forward covering his face. Bonus is that it comes in a 2 pack for great price!
customer_reviews.author: Zona Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Fit both my toddler and 6-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hats for my 16-month-old son and my 6-year-old son and they worked perfectly for both of them. I used the adjustable string to tighten one to fit my toddler and the other one I left untightened to fit my older son. Both sons wore them fairly happily and they do a good job keeping the sun off their necks and faces. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fink-Nottle

customer_reviews.title: It is nice but comes off easily with the breeze.
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and even though I read the reviews about the hat coming off with the breeze I still bought it. I am a first time mom and this purchase made me realize that looks doesn't matter... you need to get what works and PROTECTS your child. It doesn't protect if it keeps coming off specially at the beach with the breeze.
customer_reviews.author: dr_Shawttii

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it says its for toddlers and I am having difficulty keeping it on my two year olds head, even after tightening it. The awesome thing is this will last us awhile because it does accommodate different sizes! My sister wore it for twenty minutes & took it off and immediately said how the temperature went up 20 degrees after taking it off. My little one loved swimming in the water with it also. Happy it came in a pack of two..good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great little sun hats for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little sun hats for the price! Grandkids love the way the sharks brighten in the sunlight. Fits both my 3 and 4 year old grandsons well. Spent a week at the beach and it did a great job of keeping the sun off of their face and shoulders. Chin straps work well to help it stay on. Only complaint is that it is so light weight, the sides seems to flip up a lot with even a slight wind. I'd buy these again for the value, cute look and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and large! My son, who is almost 2 and has a HUGE head looks so goofy and adorable in it. It shades him perfectly in the sun, and I like that it's "bathing suit" material, so we can play in the water and it drys quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and stays on
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS HAT! It is a great blue and matches a lot of our typical boy clothes and swimsuits. Love the stretchy string you can tighten to fit. The pediatrician told us that our baby should have a hat on every time you go outside to play. The hat we did have kept blowing off in the wind or he would pull it off. This hat stays on. Glad we got it and would happily buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carly R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very small
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo likes these hats, but they are almost too small for him already, definitely not for the ages listed in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it and always wears it when we go out he never takes it off. And the strap does adjust and its very stretchy. Fits my sons head good. Covers his face neck and shoulders when were in the sun and doesnt complain that it's hot!
customer_reviews.author: No One's Here

customer_reviews.title: A whale of a hat!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3yr old's big head and velcro helps the hat stay on even when he tries to pull it off. My 6 year old likes it too, good for her in the kayak with the strap so it doesn't blow off. Hats off to this little whalerific little number.
customer_reviews.author: kmath

customer_reviews.title: These hats are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had just about given up on finding an affordable sun hat that met my criteria: wide brim, chin strap, no cartoon character. These are perfect. The adjustable band is great, we will get a lot of years out of these they stay on well. And you can't beat the price. I recommend them to all my friends with little kids. UPDATE: I originally bought these June 2017 for my 2 year old. 2 years later, of near daily summer wear and they're still going strong now on a 4yo and his 2yo brother. Still a 5 Star product hands down. If they're outside, my boys are wearing these hats.
customer_reviews.author: Stasi

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I bought two last summer at Costco ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought two last summer at Costco and we accidentally misplaced one and I’ve been looking for these same hats ever since. I love that they are adjustable and fit my two year olds rather large hat. The large brim keeps the sun off of his face.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Love the hats
customer_reviews.text: Love the hats. Bought for my 3 1/2 year old twins. They fit well despite them having different head circumferences. The boys don't fight me to wear them. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the Velcro chin strap. I think they will outgrow this faster than the hat. Then they will just dangle. It would have been better an adjustable chin strap. But for price you cannot really beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh N.

customer_reviews.title: These are great little hats and a great value for two
customer_reviews.text: These are great little hats and a great value for two! They fit my one year old good, with room to grow. There is a drawstring around the hat, so you can make it tighter if needed. Covers face and next perfectly and made out of lightweight, breathable material.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love the hat for my almost 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat for my almost 2 year old. There is an adjustable pull tab on the hat to fit your child, and the Velcro chin strap is not too tight. And I got two! And he doesn’t sweat in this hat even at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hats
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust the hat. Fits my 18m old and my 6yr old. Good coverage too. I would recommend this. And you get two. Keep one in the car for when you forget the other one or foe impromptu days outside.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pandosh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get kids to wear!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a facial scar from a dog bite and as a result cannot have sun exposure to prevent the scar from setting. These hats have made it so he can still enjoy the outdoors and be a kid! He loves the design too so he doesn’t mind wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: ... boys are 5 yrs and 2 yrs and they love these. It’s almost planting season and thre Easter ...
customer_reviews.text: my boys are 5 yrs and 2 yrs and they love these. It’s almost planting season and thre Easter Bunny brought the gardening supplies and rain gear in their baskets. they’re so thrilled to help this year and be able to kee the sun out of their eyes. These are adjustable so fit both boys nicely!
customer_reviews.author: hla110109

customer_reviews.title: Great hat! My son even leaves it on!!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! My son is 15 months and has a bit of a larger head ;) Most hats for his age are too small, but this one is large enough to wear for a while! It has a draw string to tighten and it stays on really well. He doesn't even try to pull it off! It shades him really well from the sun when we're outside. I'm really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these hats. I bought for daycare, but they wear them around the house, during the winter, and in the car too. They fit well and are easy on / off.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hats for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these hats for my 2 and 4 year old sons and they fit perfectly on both due to adjustable strap! They are great quality hats for a great price...sadly in past I think I have paid more than this for just one! Would recommend them to anyone looking for summer hats! We bought them for use in pool and stay on great!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty good for summer
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good for summer, the material is cool, I LIKE IT, the only promblem is my son refuse to wear it.😢
customer_reviews.author: Helen C

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These hats are amazing, and a great quality, especially at this price point! My boys wear them all summer long, and we even have multiple sets for Grandma’s house (for the pool), and for our swim bag. They keep the sun off of their face, ears, and necks (a must in the AZ sun), and they work great in the water (don’t droop when wet, and dry fast). My boys are 3 and 5 and have been wearing these for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: What a great value! And the sharks are super cute too
customer_reviews.text: What a great value! And the sharks are super cute too. My 5 yr old loves the hat, and I love that I have two incase we lose or forget one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hoff

customer_reviews.title: kids had fun going in and out of sun to watch it ...
customer_reviews.text: the color of the printed shape changes with sun exposure, kids had fun going in and out of sun to watch it change. These fit my 5 and 7 year old perfectly. I was having a hard time getting hats like these that weren't for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bates

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and I would buy
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo used this hat while outdoors, at the park and/or beach. Brim held up well when wet, wide enough to cover the back of his neck. The only part I would change is the Velcro chin strap (feels irritating to me), I would prefer an adjustable chinstrap . The price was right esp for 2 hats. One is typically in the car and the other in the house. I would recommend and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: 956bum

customer_reviews.title: Can get hot. Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem like good quality. Thin material and no air vents so can get hot on the head
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: The hat had some room but was adjustable which was nice but still does not stay on very well
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son has a larger head. The hat had some room but was adjustable which was nice but still does not stay on very well. The strap under the neck isnt adjustable at all. It would help if the velcro allowed for it to be a little bit tighter. When it did stay on it provided good shade for his face and neck from the sun. A good deal to get two for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lara Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and stays on the head
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Same as one sold in Costco but for much cheaper price. My little one (2years old) has a small head and this fits. It's elastic pull keeps the hat on his head even when moving around. Plenty of room for him to tow into. Probably fit him till 6 or until he loose it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, my 3.5 year old son is in the 95th percentile for head size and these fit his large noggin. Provides nice coverage and I like that you can tighten them up to fit smaller heads too, will be great to use with younger friends when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Adorable hat
customer_reviews.text: Adorable hat. Love how the sharks get darker in the sun! It provides great coverage from the son and the strap that goes under the next is helpful with keeping it on my son. So glad I bought this hat!
customer_reviews.author: James Schadt

customer_reviews.title: ... our trip to Florida last summer and they are awesome! I love the wide brim
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before our trip to Florida last summer and they are awesome! I love the wide brim, the adjusting cinch and the quality velcro on the chin strap. Sand just slides right off of these too!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Artz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hat!
customer_reviews.text: These hats are amazing and for such a great deal! We have been so thankful to have them, especially during the Summer. The size is easily adjustable. Wish they came in a larger variety of colors. They wash well and do not show signs of wear from several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Safari Hats
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hat for our son since we were going on vacation and he was going to be swimming. He loved the hats and we loved how well they blocked the sun out of his eyes. The hat has cute sharks on it. We highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly beatty

customer_reviews.title: Great sunhat. It fits my 2 year old grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sunhat. It fits my 2 year old grandson very well. The chin straps are tight on the 5 year old, but the hats do their job and since there are sharks on it the 5 year old will actually wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Princess

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Durable, lightweight. LOVE that it has mesh opening on side for air to get through
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable... fit my kid at 14 month (probably would have worked sooner, but this is when i bought it), and has plenty of room to expand. I even use it over winter hats to keep the sharp winter sun out of his eyes
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hat
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! Wonderful quality and low price. Love the color and decoration on the brim. Well worth the price. My toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A fabulous shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sun hats!
customer_reviews.text: These little sun hats are amazing. We have worn and washed several times and still love them. The brim is big enough to shade much of my little guys face and the back of his neck with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Maria0507

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: Too large. Had to adjust the chin strap. It was always falling off. He will grow into it but Toddler sizing is quite a broad term I guess. My Son is 30lbs at 1 and 1/2 and quite tall. But the quality of the hats are good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Neek

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: Very cute hat, providing excellent sun protection. Has sharks on the brim that get more noticeable when it's hot! Didn't realize that when I bought it, and when I noticed, was delighted. My son was too! Get lots of compliments on it when we're out.
customer_reviews.author: Nanwalker

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my toddler who has a bigger head, I love how adjustable it was, it fits him great now and he can grow into it. The brim is huge, but I can tell it's going to be great for sunny days ahead. Also getting two for the hats for this price is an amazing value, it just can't be beat for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mthomas23

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and practical! Only downside is the strap ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and practical ! Only downside is the strap under the hat seems to be short . Not enough to tuck it around the chin
customer_reviews.author: Han J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very good hats
customer_reviews.text: The hats are well made with nice color and adjustable=size headband, The price is particularly atttrsactive.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Great hat.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on my kids small 2 year old head. Brim is wide so it pretects the neck and partial shoulders. He looks reallycute with it on. Great hat.
customer_reviews.author: GreenGirl

customer_reviews.title: These are great for a toddler-size head
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a toddler-size head. The only downfall is that the rim/bill doesn’t bend very well to help shape the hat. Otherwise, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mhendi

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves hats so these are for his 2nd birthday. Great buy for two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Hat is perfect for the pool. My sons will use them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: bridgetrainey

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a summer hat!
customer_reviews.text: Two hats for under 10 bucks, sun protection, adjustable fit, and looks cute. What more could you want!? I love this hat. The brim is going to be too wide for a kid under 3, and my son is 3 and it fits perfectly.the chin strap is nice too, for windy beach days. Would def recommend this hat to a parent who's kid spends a lot of time outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my toddler to continually wear into the oncoming future, so it fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ian J

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is very happy to wear it and it doesn't make his head ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hats to have around the house for when the grandkids came over. My grandson is very happy to wear it and it doesn't make his head all sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: H Whiting

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: Kept the sun out of the little ones eyes. A little on the big side, but has a strap that goes under the child's chin to hold it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my two kids for days at the local pool. They fit well on both my 2 year old and my 6 year old's heads. They seem to be of pretty good quality and I hope to get a good couple years use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Ichiban

customer_reviews.title: because the quality is good and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: I acknowledge that my almost-3-year-old has a large head. But these hats *just barely* fit him. Thank goodness they do, because the quality is good and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great sun hat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this same hat last year for our grandson. Really great sun hat. Can be worn in the pool. Dries off very fast. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits toddlers of all ages, 2-pack, Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two boys (3 and 1). Fits both great! Perfect size for toddlers of all ages! I also love that it is a two pack. Great for fishing or hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hats! Easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these hats! There is an adjustable band for around the head and a chin strap. Fit both my 2 and 4 year old perfectly. Stayed on and provided great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy L. Shewbridge

customer_reviews.title: but the adjustable strap allowed me to find a setting that was comfortable for him
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 mos so I expected the hat to be too big, but the adjustable strap allowed me to find a setting that was comfortable for him. The chin strap is also very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for Mans Best Friend Too!
customer_reviews.text: Actually we bought these hats for our dog to wear while we kayak. Dogs deserve sun protection too don't they? He had one on today for the first time and it worked just fine. They are very well made for the money. Since our daughter is 26 I don't think they would work but if she was younger we would have bought and used them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! We use them everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The strap allows you to adjust perfectly. My Nephew burns very easily. He is 4. The hat also fits my 8 year old Niece. (I got the 2 pack) This has saved both of them everyday this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good price for 2 hats
customer_reviews.text: Kind of shallow. They are great hats I just wish they were a bit deeper so they could cover more.
customer_reviews.author: Danijela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats. They are easy to adjust and stay on. My kids find them comfortable and don't mind wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Provided good sun coverage and tightened so they would stay on
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with my nephews at the beach. Provided good sun coverage and tightened so they would stay on. Nephews are 18 months and 3 yo. This hat fit both of them. Excellent quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R

customer_reviews.title: Great hats! They fit both my 4 yr and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great hats! They fit both my 4 yr and 15 month old. They can be adjusted in the back so the hat can fit many sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Cara B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer hats for my 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer hats for my 4 yr old. The dry quick after pool time and are very light when dry. Not too big and bulky but provides plenty of coverage. They are easily adjustable for a snug fit and the chin strap is great to prevent loss hats in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: WhiskerWorkshop

customer_reviews.title: This is a darling hat! My son loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling hat! My son loves it and it is very adjustable to last a long while! A serious deal because you get two - I gave the other as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: mmarte12

product_meta.title: 2pk Kids Safari Hat Sun Protective Zone UPF 50+ Child Block UV Rays Shade 938151 Blue Boys Fits most children ages 3-10
